title: PERSON OF INTEREST - Soundtrack Guide IV (Ramin Djawadi's Themes)
author: FringeMusic107
comment:
Well, that was unexpected. Thank you for this compilation.
Martine's themes are really skin-crawling. I can't get enough of them.

0:06 Martine Rousseau
1:48 Brotherhood / Dominic
3:39 Threat (connected to "Imminent Threat" - see part I)
4:13 Dr. Iris Campbell
Troppo bello continuate con i soliti attori
Martine is the most baddest one.
description:
[please read]
Part 4 of your handy guide to all the various music themes from Person Of Interest! A little longer than usual - you guys did ask for a Martine montage. ;) This one includes new themes and motifs from season 4, but earlier seasons as well.
